Waving a fond farewell to Copenhagen and the marvelous people of #ColdFront18. Big love to the organisers, speakers and attendees who make the event such a delight. (And a knowing nod of respect to those who ingeniously plundered the stage decor for seating at the party) https://t.co/7HTCO3XEHv
